description: A recent merge added a 'config_drive' attribute to server entities: https://code.launchpad.net/~0x44/nova/config-drive/+merge/71429. It needs to be documented as an extension, as the spec will not be updated.
title: OSAPI v1.1 needs to document config-drive as an extension

comments.content: A recent merge added a 'config_drive' attribute to server entities: https://code.launchpad.net/~0x44/nova/config-drive/+merge/71429. It needs to be documented as an extension, as the spec will not be updated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: I sent an extension template document to Chris today.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle

comments.content: This can be closed once there's an ExtensionDescriptor specific to config_drive added in nova/api/openstack/v2/contrib/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content: Actually, per the bug report this was done as I documented the feature as an extension. The bug report doesn't request that the feature be implemented as an extension, and I do not believe it should be implemented as an extension.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~0x44

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/9924
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/a1aa75383fd4f04d690c547e23f79f51662f6608
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a1aa75383fd4f04d690c547e23f79f51662f6608
Author: isethi <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jul 23 15:36:13 2012 +0000

    Implements config_drive as extension
    
    Adding config drive as an extension allows users to turn it off in case they
    do not want to use it. Config drive was not intended to be a part of the core
    functionality.
    
    Fixes bug 833331
    
    Change-Id: Icf4b5a21d8cc9df0f140a1a87908ff48c447004b
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
